Original:
今天點了一杯mojito跟Swway特調，坐在吧台區的好處就是可以看Bartender表演精湛的調酒技術，專不專業，從他們shaking的時候就可以一覽無遺，這家的確實是professional 無誤。

🍹Mojito是我最愛的酒款之一，喝得出來他們用的薄荷葉超新鮮，而且香氣跟酒體的搭配很融洽，大推👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 （後來發現他們在門口自己種了薄荷葉，難怪如此新鮮）

🥃Swway特調我們選的是偏甜的一種，使用蘋果酒跟威士忌去做調和，喝起來甜中帶一滴滴的威士忌香辣氛圍，令人非常喜歡。

🍺後來他們推薦我們喝了一款新口味的精釀啤酒，是用吐司邊去釀造的，第一口飲下便覺得香氣四溢，入口滑順中帶一點淡淡的吐司香氣，真的是滿特別又好喝的，推薦大家可以喝喝看。
EN:
Today I ordered a cup of Mojito and Swway. The advantage of sitting in the bar area is that you can watch Bartender's exquisite bartending technique. It is unprofessional. It can be seen at a glance when they are shameing. This one is indeed Professional.

是mojito is one of my favorite wines. You can drink the mint leaves that they use are super fresh, and the aroma and the wine body are very harmonious. Mint leaves, no wonder it is so fresh)

调Swway is special. We choose a sweet one. Use apple wine to reconcile with whiskey. It is very favorite to drink a drop of whiskey with a drop of whiskey in the sweetness.

Later, they recommended us to drink a new flavor of craft beer, which was made with toast while brewing. The first sip of drinking felt the aroma, and the entrance was smooth. It is particularly delicious and delicious. It is recommended that you can drink and drink.

夜晚很安靜，只有幾個客人。冰箱裡有很多當地啤酒可供選擇，而且價格也很公道。
酒保很友好，電視上播放體育節目。威士忌和雞尾酒的選擇也很有趣。
如果您在該地區，這是一個不錯的選擇。
EN:
Interesting and leisurely bars are located in front of the baseball field.After the game, I stopped and let the crowd disperse.
The night is very quiet, there are only a few guests.There are many local beer to choose from in the refrigerator, and the price is fair.
The wine insurance is very friendly, playing sports programs on TV.The choice of whiskey and cocktail is also very interesting.
If you are in the area, this is a good choice.
